d2_dictionary.object_name: Regulatory Application Forms with Registered Family and Subfamily
d2_dictionary.application_names: OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Quality and Manufacturing Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Research and Development Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Research and Development Solution
d2_dictionary.dql: select distinct application_description as name, application_description as label_en from cd_reg_admin_info where a_status != 'Inactive' and dv_device_family='$value(dv_device_family)' and dv_device_subfamily = '$value(dv_device_subfamily)' and any dv_device_code in ($repeatingvalue(dv_device_code))
d2_dictionary.label_en: Regulatory Application Forms with Registered Family and Subfamily
